specific_question: How much did we spend on facility maintenance and repairs in Q1 2024?
answer: We spent $120,000 on facility maintenance and repairs in Q1 2024, a 10% increase from Q4 2023.
justification: Facility maintenance costs do not address the core DR Question focus area of IT service desk workload and response times
dr_question: How can we leverage ISTM and AI-driven analytics to minimize IT service desk workload and improve response times in MediConn Solutions?
